00036 using namespace std;

00040 // FullyConnectedLayer : single network layer class
00042 // WB structure: (num units "neurons / filters" x (num features + 1))
00043 // Each row represents a neuron / filter
00044 // There is a column for each feature coming in from the previous layer plus 1 for the bias
00045 // [W0 ...   B0]
00046 // [|         |]
00047 // [Wn       Bn]
00048 // [0  ...  0 1] - Initialize the final row to be all zeros and 1 in the bias to properly
00049 //                 set the bias for the next layer
00050 // WB_D structure:
00051 // [dW     dB]
00052 // [0 ... 0 0]
00053 // D structure:
00054 // [D        ]
00055 // [0 ... 0 0]
00056 // Z, Zs, Act, Acts structure:
00057 // [Acts     ]
00058 // [1 ... 1 1]
00059 
00060 lbann::FullyConnectedLayer::
00061 FullyConnectedLayer(const uint index,
00062                     const int numPrevNeurons,
00063                     const uint numNeurons,
00064                     const uint miniBatchSize,
00065                     const activation_type activationType,
00066                     const weight_initialization init,
00067                     lbann_comm* comm,
00068                     Optimizer *optimizer,
00069                     std::vector<regularizer*> regs)
00070   : Layer(index, comm, optimizer, miniBatchSize, activationType, regs),
00071     m_weight_initialization(init),
00072     WB_view(comm->get_model_grid()),
00073     WB_D_view(comm->get_model_grid()),
00074     Acts_view(comm->get_model_grid())
00075 {
00076     Index = index;
00077     NumNeurons = numNeurons;
00078     WBL2NormSum = 0.0;
00079 }
00080 
00081 lbann::FullyConnectedLayer::~FullyConnectedLayer() {}
00082 
00083 void lbann::FullyConnectedLayer::setup(int numPrevNeurons) {
00084   Layer::setup(numPrevNeurons);
00085     if(optimizer != NULL) {
00086       optimizer->setup(numPrevNeurons+1, NumNeurons+1);
00087     }
00088 
00089     // Initialize weight-bias matrix
00090     Zeros(*WB, NumNeurons+1, numPrevNeurons+1);
00091     if(WB->IsLocal(NumNeurons,numPrevNeurons)) {
00092       WB->SetLocal(WB->LocalHeight()-1, WB->LocalWidth()-1, DataType(1));
00093     }
00094 
00095     // Initialize weights
00096     DistMat weights;
00097     View(weights, *WB, IR(0,NumNeurons), IR(0,numPrevNeurons));
00098     switch(m_weight_initialization) {
00099     case weight_initialization::uniform:
00100       uniform_fill(weights, weights.Height(), weights.Width(),
00101                    DataType(0), DataType(1));
00102       break;
00103     case weight_initialization::normal:
00104       gaussian_fill(weights, weights.Height(), weights.Width(),
00105                     DataType(0), DataType(1));
00106       break;
00107     case weight_initialization::glorot_normal: {
00108       const DataType var = 2.0 / (numPrevNeurons + NumNeurons);
00109       gaussian_fill(weights, weights.Height(), weights.Width(),
00110                     DataType(0), sqrt(var));
00111       break;
00112     }
00113     case weight_initialization::glorot_uniform: {
00114       const DataType var = 2.0 / (numPrevNeurons + NumNeurons);
00115       uniform_fill(weights, weights.Height(), weights.Width(),
00116                    DataType(0), sqrt(3*var));
00117       break;
00118     }
00119     case weight_initialization::he_normal: {
00120       const DataType var = 1.0 / numPrevNeurons;
00121       gaussian_fill(weights, weights.Height(), weights.Width(),
00122                     DataType(0), sqrt(var));
00123       break;
00124     }
00125     case weight_initialization::he_uniform: {
00126       const DataType var = 1.0 / numPrevNeurons;
00127       uniform_fill(weights, weights.Height(), weights.Width(),
00128                    DataType(0), sqrt(3*var));
00129       break;
00130     }
00131     case weight_initialization::zero: // Zero initialization is default
00132     default:
00133       Zero(weights);
00134       break;
00135     }
00136 
00137     // Initialize other matrices
00138     Zeros(*WB_D, NumNeurons + 1, numPrevNeurons + 1);
00139     Zeros(*Ds, NumNeurons + 1, m_mini_batch_size);
00140     Zeros(*Ds_Temp, numPrevNeurons + 1, m_mini_batch_size); // Ds_Temp holds the product of WB^T * Ds
00141     Zeros(*Zs, NumNeurons + 1, m_mini_batch_size);
00142     View(WB_view, *WB, IR(0, WB->Height() - 1), IR(0, WB->Width()));
00143     View(WB_D_view, *WB_D, IR(0, WB_D->Height() - 1), IR(0, WB_D->Width()));
00144     Zeros(*Acts, NumNeurons + 1, m_mini_batch_size);
00145     View(Acts_view, *Acts, IR(0, Acts->Height() - 1), IR(0, Acts->Width()));
00146 
00147 }
00148 
00149 void lbann::FullyConnectedLayer::fp_linearity(ElMat& _WB, ElMat& _X, ElMat& _Z, ElMat& _Y)
00150 {
00151   // Convert matrices to desired format
00152   DistMatrixReadProxy<DataType,DataType,MC,MR> WBProxy(_WB);
00153   DistMatrixReadProxy<DataType,DataType,MC,MR> XProxy(_X); // TODO: Store for bp step
00154   DistMatrixWriteProxy<DataType,DataType,MC,MR> ZProxy(_Z);
00155   DistMatrixWriteProxy<DataType,DataType,MC,MR> YProxy(_Y);
00156   DistMat& WB = WBProxy.Get();
00157   DistMat& X = XProxy.Get();
00158   DistMat& Z = ZProxy.Get();
00159   DistMat& Y = YProxy.Get();
00160 
00161   // Apply forward prop linearity
00162   Gemm(NORMAL, NORMAL, (DataType) 1., WB, X, (DataType) 0., Z);
00163   Copy(Z, Y);
00164 }
00165 
00166 void lbann::FullyConnectedLayer::bp_linearity()
00167 {
00168     // Convert forward and backward prop matrices to MC,MR format
00169     DistMatrixReadProxy<DataType,DataType,MC,MR> XProxy(*fp_input); // TODO: store from fp step
00170     DistMat& X = XProxy.Get();
00171 
00172     // Compute the partial delta update for the next lower layer
00173     Gemm(TRANSPOSE, NORMAL, (DataType) 1., *WB, *Ds, (DataType) 0., *Ds_Temp);
00174     // Compute update for weights
00175     Gemm(NORMAL, TRANSPOSE, (DataType) 1.0/get_effective_minibatch_size(), *Ds,
00176          X, (DataType) 0., *WB_D);
00177 }
00178 
00179 DataType lbann::FullyConnectedLayer::computeCost(DistMat &deltas) {
00180     DataType avg_error = 0.0, total_error = 0.0;
00181     // Compute the L2 norm on the deltas (activation - y)
00182     ColSumMat norms;
00183     ColumnTwoNorms(deltas, norms);
00184     int c = 0;
00185     // Sum the local, total error
00186     for(int r = 0; r < norms.LocalHeight(); r++) {
00187       total_error += norms.GetLocal(r,c);
00188     }
00189     mpi::AllReduce(total_error, norms.DistComm());
00190     avg_error = total_error / norms.Height();
00191     return avg_error;
00192 }
00193 
00194 DataType lbann::FullyConnectedLayer::WBL2norm() {
00195   DataType nrm2 = Nrm2(*WB);
00196   return nrm2 * nrm2;
00197 }
00198 
00199 inline DataType _sq(DataType x) { return (x * x); }
00200 inline DataType _sqrt(DataType x) { return (1 / sqrt(x + 1e-8)); }
00201 
00202 bool lbann::FullyConnectedLayer::update()
00203 {
00204   if(m_execution_mode == execution_mode::training) {
00205     optimizer->update_weight_bias_matrix(*WB_D, *WB);
00206   }
00207   return true;
00208 }
00209 
00210 DataType lbann::FullyConnectedLayer::checkGradient(Layer& PrevLayer, const DataType Epsilon)
00211 {
00212     DistMat WB_E1(WB->Grid());
00213     DistMat WB_E2(WB->Grid());
00214     DistMat Zs_E1(Zs->Grid());
00215     DistMat Zs_E2(Zs->Grid());
00216     DistMat Acts_E1(Acts->Grid());
00217     DistMat Acts_E2(Acts->Grid());
00218     DataType grad_diff = 0;
00219     DataType grad_sum = 0;
00220 
00221     Zeros(WB_E1, WB->Height(), WB->Width());
00222     Zeros(WB_E2, WB->Height(), WB->Width());
00223     Zeros(Zs_E1, Zs->Height(), Zs->Width());
00224     Zeros(Zs_E2, Zs->Height(), Zs->Width());
00225     Zeros(Acts_E1, Acts->Height(), Acts->Width());
00226     Zeros(Acts_E2, Acts->Height(), Acts->Width());
00227 
00228     Copy(*WB, WB_E1);
00229     Copy(*WB, WB_E2);
00230 
00231     DataType sum_error = 0;
00232     int prow = 0;
00233     int pcol = 0;
00234 
00235     if(WB_E1.IsLocal(prow, pcol)) {
00236       int _prow = WB_E1.LocalRow(prow);
00237       int _pcol = WB_E1.LocalCol(pcol);
00238       WB_E1.SetLocal(_prow, _pcol, WB_E1.GetLocal(_prow, _pcol) + Epsilon);
00239     }
00240     if(WB_E2.IsLocal(prow, pcol)) {
00241       int _prow = WB_E2.LocalRow(prow);
00242       int _pcol = WB_E2.LocalCol(pcol);
00243       WB_E2.SetLocal(_prow, _pcol, WB_E2.GetLocal(_prow, _pcol) - Epsilon);
00244     }
00245     for (int row = 0; row < WB->Height(); row++) {
00246         for (int col = 0; col < WB->Width(); col++) {
00247           //          printf("Updating %d: %d x %d\n", Index, row, col);
00248             if(WB_E1.IsLocal(prow, pcol)) {
00249               int _prow = WB_E1.LocalRow(prow);
00250               int _pcol = WB_E1.LocalCol(pcol);
00251               WB_E1.SetLocal(_prow, _pcol, WB_E1.GetLocal(_prow, _pcol) - Epsilon);
00252             }
00253             if(WB_E2.IsLocal(prow, pcol)) {
00254               int _prow = WB_E2.LocalRow(prow);
00255               int _pcol = WB_E2.LocalCol(pcol);
00256               WB_E2.SetLocal(_prow, _pcol, WB_E2.GetLocal(_prow, _pcol) + Epsilon);
00257             }
00258             if(WB_E1.IsLocal(row, col)) {
00259               int _row = WB_E1.LocalRow(row);
00260               int _col = WB_E1.LocalCol(col);
00261               WB_E1.SetLocal(_row,  _col,  WB_E1.GetLocal(_row, _col)   + Epsilon);
00262             }
00263             if(WB_E2.IsLocal(row, col)) {
00264               int _row = WB_E2.LocalRow(row);
00265               int _col = WB_E2.LocalCol(col);
00266               WB_E2.SetLocal(_row,  _col,  WB_E2.GetLocal(_row, _col)   - Epsilon);
00267             }
00268 
00269             // J(theta)
00270             this->fp_linearity(*WB, *(PrevLayer.Acts), *Zs, *Acts);
00271             //this->fp_nonlinearity(*Acts);
00272 
00273             // J(thetaPlus(i))
00274             this->fp_linearity(WB_E1, *(PrevLayer.Acts), Zs_E1, Acts_E1);
00275             //this->fp_nonlinearity(Acts_E1);
00276 
00277             // J(thetaMinus(i))
00278             this->fp_linearity(WB_E2, *(PrevLayer.Acts), Zs_E2, Acts_E2);
00279             //this->fp_nonlinearity(Acts_E2);
00280 
00281             //            this->getCost();
00282 
00283             // gradApprox(i) = J(thetaPlus(i)) - J(thetaMinus(i)) / (2*Epsilon)
00284             Axpy(-1.0, *Acts, Acts_E1);
00285             Axpy(-1.0, *Acts, Acts_E2);
00286 
00287             bool bad_E1 = false, bad_E2 = false;
00288             for(int r = 0; r < Acts->Height(); r++) {
00289               for(int c = 0; c < Acts->Width(); c++) {
00290                 if(Acts_E1.IsLocal(r,c)) {
00291                   int _r = Acts_E1.LocalRow(r);
00292                   int _c = Acts_E1.LocalCol(c);
00293                   if((Acts_E1.GetLocal(_r,_c) > 1e-12 || Acts_E1.GetLocal(_r,_c) < -1e-12) && r != row) {
00294                     bad_E1 = true;
00295                     //                    cout << "Acts_E1=["<< r << "," << c << "]="<<Acts_E1.GetLocal(_r,_c)<<endl;
00296                   }
00297                 }
00298                 if(Acts_E2.IsLocal(r,c)) {
00299                   int _r = Acts_E2.LocalRow(r);
00300                   int _c = Acts_E2.LocalCol(c);
00301                   if((Acts_E2.GetLocal(_r,_c) > 1e-12 || Acts_E2.GetLocal(_r,_c) < -1e-12) && r != row) {
00302                     bad_E2 = true;
00303                     //                    cout << "Acts_E2=["<< r << "," << c << "]="<<Acts_E2.GetLocal(_r,_c)<<endl;
00304                   }
00305                 }
00306               }
00307             }
00308 
00309             if(bad_E1) {
00310               if(Acts_E1.Grid().Rank() == 0) {
00311                 printf("BAD ENTRY Acts_E1 %d x %d\n", row, col);
00312               }
00313               cout.precision(20);
00314               Print(Acts_E1);
00315               if(Acts_E1.Grid().Rank() == 0) {
00316                 printf("Acts\n");
00317               }
00318               Print(*Acts);
00319             }
00320             if(bad_E2) {
00321               if(Acts_E2.Grid().Rank() == 0) {
00322                 printf("BAD ENTRY Acts_E2 %d x %d\n", row, col);
00323               }
00324               Print(Acts_E2);
00325             }
00326 
00327             prow = row;
00328             pcol = col;
00329         }
00330     }
00331     DataType grad_error = sqrt(grad_diff / grad_sum);
00332     return grad_error;
00333 }
